title: Find f(x) based on f''(x), f'(1) and f(2) part - c

content.description:
Let f be the function that is defined for all real numbers x and that has the following properties.

(i) f″(x)=24x−18

(ii) f′(1)=−6

(iii) f(2)=0
content.question: Find the average value of f on the interval 1≤ x ≤ 3.

frqParts.text: Find the average value of f on the interval 1≤ x ≤ 3.

topic.text: 8.1: Finding the Average Value of a Function on an Interval

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
